PackageOracle.name: DA_PARTY_PRIVATE_PREF
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PARTY_PRIVATE_PREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.06.959459000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_private_pref_cnt IN NUMBER
,party_private_start_dt IN DATE
,creating_party_id IN NUMBER
,individual_party_id IN NUMBER
,party_private_end_dt IN DATE
,private_data_cd IN VARCHAR2
,private_data_usage_cd IN VARCHAR2
,private_pref_ind IN NUMBER
,contact_per_cd IN VARCHAR2
,channel_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_private_pref_cnt IN NUMBER
,party_private_start_dt IN DATE
,creating_party_id IN NUMBER
,individual_party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_party_private_pref;

body.name: DA_PARTY_PRIVATE_PREF
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PARTY_PRIVATE_PREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.06.977378000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_private_pref_cnt IN NUMBER
,party_private_start_dt IN DATE
,creating_party_id IN NUMBER
,individual_party_id IN NUMBER
,party_private_end_dt IN DATE
,private_data_cd IN VARCHAR2
,private_data_usage_cd IN VARCHAR2
,private_pref_ind IN NUMBER
,contact_per_cd IN VARCHAR2
,channel_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_party_private_pref.add, parms=' || party_private_pref_cnt || '|' || party_private_start_dt || '|' || creating_party_id || '|' || individual_party_id || '|' || party_private_end_dt || '|' || private_data_cd || '|' || private_data_usage_cd || '|' || private_pref_ind || '|' || contact_per_cd || '|' || channel_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_party_private_pref a
(
a.party_private_pref_cnt
,a.party_private_start_dt
,a.creating_party_id
,a.individual_party_id
,a.party_private_end_dt
,a.private_data_cd
,a.private_data_usage_cd
,a.private_pref_ind
,a.contact_per_cd
,a.channel_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.party_private_pref_cnt
,add.party_private_start_dt
,add.creating_party_id
,add.individual_party_id
,add.party_private_end_dt
,add.private_data_cd
,add.private_data_usage_cd
,add.private_pref_ind
,add.contact_per_cd
,add.channel_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_party_private_pref.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_private_pref_cnt IN NUMBER
,party_private_start_dt IN DATE
,creating_party_id IN NUMBER
,individual_party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_party_private_pref.del, parms=' || party_private_pref_cnt || '|' || party_private_start_dt || '|' || creating_party_id || '|' || individual_party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_party_private_pref a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.party_private_pref_cnt = del.party_private_pref_cnt
AND a.party_private_start_dt = del.party_private_start_dt
AND a.creating_party_id = del.creating_party_id
AND a.individual_party_id = del.individual_party_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_party_private_pref.del');

END del;

END da_party_private_pref;
